name: Sweet and Spicy Green Beans
author: COOKOFTHEHOUSE
summary: The flavors of this side dish are intense! It is great as a starter to an Asian menu, or as a significant addition to a light stir-fry meal.
ingredients: ¾ pound fresh green beans, trimmed
directions: Arrange a steamer basket in a pot over boiling water, and steam the green beans 3 to 4 minutes
In a bowl, mix the soy sauce, garlic, garlic chili sauce, and honey
Heat the canola oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add the green beans, and fry for  3 to 5 minutes
Pour in the soy sauce mixture
Continue cooking and stirring 2 minutes, or until the liquid is nearly evaporated
